be.sizingservers.vapus.agent.util

Class CounterInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.sizingservers.vapus.agent.util.CounterInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CounterInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A wdyh (what do you have) counterInfo to serialize from and to (used lib: gson-2.2.4.jar). Sub CounterInfos can be added. If a CounterInfo is a 'leafnode', it can have a counter value (type String to be able to deserialize).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • match

        protected boolean match(CounterInfo counterInfo,
            boolean matchCounter)
        Match the name and the subs if any with the given CounterInfo. The order of CounterInfos in both collections is not important. You can choose not to match the counter.
        Parameters:
        counterInfo -
        matchCounter -
        Returns:

                                                    throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                           java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        level -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - CounterInfos does not exist at the given level. Can happen if not all subheaders have the same number of levels.
        java.lang.Exception - The given level cannot be smaller than 0.
